attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This is app is just terrible, it takes too long to load, attracts bugs, literally. Everytime i was in the app bugs would would come crawling, you don’t want bugs!!

attributes.title: this app stinks
attributes.review: literally. after i downloaded this app a weird stench started to brew from inside of my phone!! i was really confused honestly and it nearly made me PASS OUT. the stench was strong. im lucky to still be alive to tell this story to this day.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is completely useless it took forever to download and when it did it kept glitching I hate this app and would not even recommend it to my greatest enemy

attributes.title: i am disgusted
attributes.review:
when you first open the app it says “keep america great” but it was never great. we are on stolen land, there is racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, discrimination, and so much more. i am disgusted with this cult-like saying because of his superiority complex. 1 star from me. 
Tabitha brown 2020 ✨😍

attributes.title: Virus. DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app was so glitchy and kept crashing everytime I tried to open it. Eventually my phone crashed and I found out I had a virus. This is a brand new phone and it happened right after I got the app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.title: VERY VERY ORANGE AND TERRIFYING
attributes.review: This app took soooo long to download, and when I opened it I saw Trumps no no area . It was farrrr too little and honestly very orange . The app then later made accusations that I was a drug dealer and rapist I- 😍😍😍🙈🙈💯🙅🙅 . My dog then ended up spazzing out due to this horrible app and I am very disgusted with it 🌚🧚🏽✨💫😼🤰🏽💅🏼👁👄👁🧟‍♂️💯🙅💯💯👅 .

attributes.title: Nobody wants this.
attributes.review: I tried to download this and it took WEEKS AND WEEKS TO DOWNLOAD!!! it made my whole phone glitch and i was barely able to delete it off my phone!!!!!!!!!!!!!! TAKE THIS APP OFF THE APP STORE NOW ITS MAKING MY PHONE GLITCH LIKE CRAZY AND NOBODY WANTS TO DEAL WITH IT !!!  🧚🏼‍♀️✨ nobody wants an app with an orange person in charge of it✨🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: RIP BUNKER BOY
attributes.review:
I was so surprised to see this app still up and running after... ya know... his untimely overdose...
I miss Mr. Carrot so much 
Papa trump was my only hope in this sad life and now he’s gone?!? People keep saying it’s a hoax but they’re just hurt and sad that he’s gone 😣

Anyways ... rest in hell bunker boy 🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.title: Horrible app!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to educate myself about our president and it kept kicking me out! It took forever to download and I think it ruined my phone’s software!!! I would give it a 0/5 if I could!!!

attributes.title: It all started when I got this app
attributes.review: I was fine with the app. It existed in my phone 😾 then a bunch of orange 🍊 monkeys 🦧 came into my house!!! 🏡 they stole all my belongings and even my cosplays 😪👩🏼‍🎤👾 I’m very upset!!! ISNT this illegal? 🤒👿 pp is trump because he’s the one who sent the monkeys 🐒 so thanks ugly orange 🍊
